DataElement.preferredName: FEV1 Post Bronchodilation Percent of Predicted Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical quantity computed for quantitative evaluation of a forecasted or presumed value against the actual observation value of the volume exhaled after the first second of a forced expiratory maneuver started from the level of total lung capacity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: FEV1 Post Bronchodilator Percent of Predicted Value
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A test of lung function, the FEV1 is the volume exhaled during the first second of a forced expiratory maneuver started from the level of total lung capacity. It is the most frequently used index for assessing bronchoconstriction or bronchodilatation._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._A type of drug that causes small airways in the lungs to open up. Bronchodilators are inhaled and are used to treat breathing disorders, such as asthma or emphysema._A unit of percentage measurement for quantitative evaluation of a forecasted or presumed value against the actual observation value.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A test of lung function, the FEV1 is the volume exhaled during the first second of a forced expiratory maneuver started from the level of total lung capacity. It is the most frequently used index for assessing bronchoconstriction or bronchodilatation. (from http://www.spirxpert.com/indices7.htm)

Concepts.definition: A test of lung function, the FEV1 is the volume exhaled during the first second of a forced expiratory maneuver started from the level of total lung capacity. It is the most frequently used index for assessing bronchoconstriction or bronchodilatation.

Property.preferredName: Post Bronchodilator Percent of Predicted Value
Property.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Agents that cause an increase in the expansion of a bronchus or bronchial tubes.:A unit of percentage measurement for quantitative evaluation of a forecasted or presumed value against the actual observation value.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Agents that cause an increase in the expansion of a bronchus or bronchial tubes.
A unit of percentage measurement for quantitative evaluation of a forecasted or presumed value against the actual observation value.
